name: Lord Of Destruction
description:
A game where you can destroy anything and fight skeletons.

Two gamemodes are included, story and arena.

Story is about, well, killing skeletons while following a story, and arena is killing skeletons while trying to survive.

If you manage to survive at least two minutes in arena, i'll be impressed.

I made this game for Brackeys 6th Game Jam using Unity.
